---
name: Bug report
about: Create a report to help us improve
title: "[BUG]"
labels: bug
assignees: SlonickLab

---

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is. (e.g., "The video was saved to the Desktop folder instead of the Game folder").

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Open Game: [e.g. Counter-Strike 2]
2. Action: [e.g. Pressed "Save Replay" hotkey / Stopped Recording / Took Screenshot]
3. Result: [e.g. Notification showed "Desktop", file moved to Desktop]

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Environment Info (Required):**
 - **Smart Replay Mover Version:** [e.g. v2.7.4]
 - **OBS Version:** [e.g. 30.1.0]
 - **Windows Version:** [e.g. Windows 10 22H2 / Windows 11]
 - **Game Name:** [e.g. Cyberpunk 2077]

**Script Settings**
Please list relevant settings or attach a screenshot of the script settings window.
- Add game prefix: [Yes/No]
- Fallback folder: [e.g. Desktop]
- Custom Names used: [Yes/No]

**OBS Log File (Crucial)**
Please verify the OBS Log (Help -> Log Files -> View Current Log).
Look for lines starting with `[Smart Replay]`. Paste the relevant log snippet here:
```text
[Smart Replay] Game detected: ...
[Smart Replay] Moved file to: ...
